description: Institutional support to implementation of a New Legal Framework in the Kyrgyz Republic

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of national human rights institutions
subproject.description:
Output 1: 
Laws and by-laws aligned with the new Constitution, national and international commitments
Output 2: 
Implementation of a new legal framework improved via better oversight  over the Executive, public finance, national and sectoral reform plans, national and international laws 
Output 3:
Institutional capacity of selected governmental institutions strengthened in order to meet requirements of the new parliamentary governance system
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: New Legal Framework

title: New Legal Framework
